statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM supplier_info ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_person, contact_number FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id > 3 ORDER BY supplier_location DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_info WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%' OR contact_person LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_id FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date, product_name, quantity FROM suppliers JOIN deliveries ON suppliers.supplier_id = deliveries.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person_email = 'contact@example.com';
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN deliveries d ON s.supplier_id = d.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, delivery_date FROM deliveries WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_quantity FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_quantity < 50 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, delivery_date FROM suppliers s JOIN deliveries d ON s.supplier_id = d.supplier_id JOIN products p ON d.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN deliveries d ON s.supplier_id = d.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING SUM(delivery_quantity) > 100;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, delivery_date FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN deliveries d ON s.supplier_id = d.supplier_id LEFT JOIN products p ON d.product_id = p.product_id WHERE delivery_quantity >= 50;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, delivery_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Deliveries ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Deliveries.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, delivery_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Deliveries ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Deliveries.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT delivery_date, quantity FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, quantity_available FROM warehouse_location WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE quantity > 100 AND delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT delivery_id, status, remarks FROM delivery_status WHERE status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY delivery_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, quantity_available FROM warehouse_location WHERE product_id = 3 AND quantity_available > 0;
